channel.title: Product Hunt 热门
channel.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

item.title: Writex.io - An online editor with super powers
item.description: Online editor with super powers. Customise your writing experience, build your Wikis, use power of AI analysis to check readability and phonetic quality, use extremely advanced spell check for more than 20 languages, export your books. Write smarter.
item.content:encoded: Online editor with super powers. Customise your writing experience, build your Wikis, use power of AI analysis to check readability and phonetic quality, use extremely advanced spell check for more than 20 languages, export your books. Write smarter.

item.title: My Year in Review - Reflect on your year 2021 in minutes
item.description: myyearinreview helps you reflect on your year in a simple, guided and fun way
item.content:encoded: myyearinreview helps you reflect on your year in a simple, guided and fun way

item.title: Notion Diary - Bootstraps your notion pages to a blogsite
item.description: A simple application that bootstraps your notion pages to a blog site. No more complicated setups, users can simply log in and add database id, that's it. Moreover, user can add their social links to increase their reach. Showcase: https://www.notiondiary.xyz/lakshya
item.content:encoded: A simple application that bootstraps your notion pages to a blog site. No more complicated setups, users can simply log in and add database id, that's it. Moreover, user can add their social links to increase their reach. Showcase: https://www.notiondiary.xyz/lakshya

item.title: PipeCandy Prospector - Ground truth about global e-commerce and DTC companies
item.description: PipeCandy is now the only company that tracks all eCommerce companies with at least $10,000 annual revenue. With this launch, we also track 150,000 DTC brands.
item.content:encoded: PipeCandy is now the only company that tracks all eCommerce companies with at least $10,000 annual revenue. With this launch, we also track 150,000 DTC brands.

item.title: Sendspark for Linkedin - Drive more sales meetings with videos on Linkedin
item.description: See up to 4x more replies from LinkedIn outreach with video! Just install the Sendspark Chrome Extension to record and insert videos right from Sales Navigator and the LinkedIn message composer.
item.content:encoded: See up to 4x more replies from LinkedIn outreach with video! Just install the Sendspark Chrome Extension to record and insert videos right from Sales Navigator and the LinkedIn message composer.

item.title: Product Ideas On-Demand - Get ideas that match your interests, skills and projects
item.description: We leverage AI (with a human touch) to generate product ideas based on your interests, skills, and past projects.
item.content:encoded: We leverage AI (with a human touch) to generate product ideas based on your interests, skills, and past projects.

item.title: Product Prediction - I asked GPT-3 to guess what the top makers will build next
item.description: I love generating ideas with GPT-3 and I had an idea to feed it with products created by the top (and my favorite) makers and then I told it to predict what their next projects will be. I thought the results were interesting!
item.content:encoded: I love generating ideas with GPT-3 and I had an idea to feed it with products created by the top (and my favorite) makers and then I told it to predict what their next projects will be. I thought the results were interesting!

item.title: Momento - A minimalist life reminder
item.description: Momento is a tool to help you take action. Your life is very precious so make it worth it.
item.content:encoded: Momento is a tool to help you take action. Your life is very precious so make it worth it.

item.title: Chord Commerce - Headless commerce is hard, we make it easy for you
item.description: Chord is a commerce-as-a-service software for fast-growing D2C brands. We offer a flexible (headless) tech stack for commerce companies that is fully equipped with sophisticated data insights for the optimal customer experience.
item.content:encoded: Chord is a commerce-as-a-service software for fast-growing D2C brands. We offer a flexible (headless) tech stack for commerce companies that is fully equipped with sophisticated data insights for the optimal customer experience.

item.title: 1Tagline - Marketing gurus to help craft amazing texts
item.description: Get advice from the great marketers who can help you craft catchy taglines for your product or article.
item.content:encoded: Get advice from the great marketers who can help you craft catchy taglines for your product or article.

item.title: DeepLobe - Your no-code machine learning platform
item.description: A no-code machine learning platform built to unleash the power of computer vision and automation. It's a smart, scalable, cost-effective ML API as a service platform that trains and integrates state-of-the-art machine learning and deep learning.
item.content:encoded: A no-code machine learning platform built to unleash the power of computer vision and automation. It's a smart, scalable, cost-effective ML API as a service platform that trains and integrates state-of-the-art machine learning and deep learning.

item.title: Flip Clock - The famous flip clock available on the web
item.description: This is the web version of the famous flip clock that we see all over the internet
item.content:encoded: This is the web version of the famous flip clock that we see all over the internet

item.title: Voiceliner - Braindump better.
item.description: The fastest way to capture and structure your thoughts: through voice. Hold record, speak, and release. Just like you'd expect from an outliner, create hierarchies and rearrange. Notes are auto-transcribed and searchable. Local-first and open source.
item.content:encoded: The fastest way to capture and structure your thoughts: through voice. Hold record, speak, and release. Just like you'd expect from an outliner, create hierarchies and rearrange. Notes are auto-transcribed and searchable. Local-first and open source.

item.title: BRICKS Design System - A free, customizable MaterialUI design system
item.description: BRICKS is a full Design System, based on ! ♻️ Open source 🔥 50+ components 🎨 Design Tokens system 📚 Embedded Interactive documentation 🌗 Dark mode
item.content:encoded: BRICKS is a full Design System, based on ! ♻️ Open source 🔥 50+ components 🎨 Design Tokens system 📚 Embedded Interactive documentation 🌗 Dark mode

item.title: rewalt - Marketplace for all your unused rewards
item.description: Introducing rewalt - A community marketplace for all the unused rewards. Type of rewards/coupons: 1. Amazon Pay Rewards 2. Google Pay Rewards 3. PhonePe Rewards 4. Walmart/Target/Best Buy Rewards 6. All types of transferrable rewards/coupons
item.content:encoded: Introducing rewalt - A community marketplace for all the unused rewards. Type of rewards/coupons: 1. Amazon Pay Rewards 2. Google Pay Rewards 3. PhonePe Rewards 4. Walmart/Target/Best Buy Rewards 6. All types of transferrable rewards/coupons

item.title: St0nk - Gift Indian stocks to your friends and family
item.description: Hey Product Hunt, Swadesh is back with another gem of a drop. You can gift Indian stocks to your friends and family which will be a really interesting Christmas gift. It’s open to anyone in the United States right now!
item.content:encoded: Hey Product Hunt, Swadesh is back with another gem of a drop. You can gift Indian stocks to your friends and family which will be a really interesting Christmas gift. It’s open to anyone in the United States right now!

item.title: Wikifox - Wikipedia reimagined
item.description: Wikifox (beta) is a clean and simplified version of the real Wikipedia! This works with official Wikipedia, so nothing to worry about!. It has a good and clean user interface with Dark, Light and custom themes! Check it out : https://wikifox.ml/
item.content:encoded: Wikifox (beta) is a clean and simplified version of the real Wikipedia! This works with official Wikipedia, so nothing to worry about!. It has a good and clean user interface with Dark, Light and custom themes! Check it out : https://wikifox.ml/

item.title: Flickcall - Watch together on your favorite streaming platforms
item.description: Flickcall is a privacy-focused browser extension to watch movies & TV shows together. Your personal chats & video stream are delivered directly to peers (without backend servers). Supports Netflix, Youtube, Primevideo, Hotstar, & Zee5.
item.content:encoded: Flickcall is a privacy-focused browser extension to watch movies & TV shows together. Your personal chats & video stream are delivered directly to peers (without backend servers). Supports Netflix, Youtube, Primevideo, Hotstar, & Zee5.

item.title: Otis House - IRL 🤝 NFT
item.description: Otis House is a marketplace, auction platform, and vault for physical items, built on top of Ethereum. The physical items are stored, secured, and insured by Otis. We then mint an NFT for each item representing ownership of the asset.
item.content:encoded: Otis House is a marketplace, auction platform, and vault for physical items, built on top of Ethereum. The physical items are stored, secured, and insured by Otis. We then mint an NFT for each item representing ownership of the asset.

item.title: TechSpecs VS - AI that automatically compares smartphones for you
item.description: Hello Product hunters, Stop comparing smartphones manually. Use TechSpecs AI technology to automatically compare and find the best smartphone.
item.content:encoded: Hello Product hunters, Stop comparing smartphones manually. Use TechSpecs AI technology to automatically compare and find the best smartphone.

item.title: WAGMI Cards - Gift $MATIC to your loved ones through WAGMI gift cards.
item.description: Looking for a way to introduce your friends and family to the magical world of Cryptocurrency? This holiday season, use Wagmi.Cards to gift them some MATIC
item.content:encoded: Looking for a way to introduce your friends and family to the magical world of Cryptocurrency? This holiday season, use Wagmi.Cards to gift them some MATIC

item.title: Icon Shelf - A free icon manager for web developers
item.description: Icon Shelf is a free and open-source SVG icon manager for web developers. Improve how you add icons to your frontend project. All your icons in one place, easily copyable as code.
item.content:encoded: Icon Shelf is a free and open-source SVG icon manager for web developers. Improve how you add icons to your frontend project. All your icons in one place, easily copyable as code.

item.title: The Ultimate Mouse Mover - Keep your computer in 'work' mode without touching the mouse
item.description: This software allows you to simulate real mouse movements on your Windows PC! Most importantly you get the source code & guarantee virus-free! Don't worry anymore about your computer logging off or the work status changing. Stay always Online!
item.content:encoded: This software allows you to simulate real mouse movements on your Windows PC! Most importantly you get the source code & guarantee virus-free! Don't worry anymore about your computer logging off or the work status changing. Stay always Online!

item.title: minulle - Preview YouTube thumbnails and titles before you upload
item.description: minulle allows you to preview your YouTube thumbnails and titles on the home, search and the subscription page of YouTube. I challenged myself to build a SaaS app in just 3 hours and this is the result of that 🚀
item.content:encoded: minulle allows you to preview your YouTube thumbnails and titles on the home, search and the subscription page of YouTube. I challenged myself to build a SaaS app in just 3 hours and this is the result of that 🚀

item.title: OrgPad - A simple and easy-to-use app that liberates your thinking
item.description: OrgPad is a universal tool. It is good for planning, brainstorming, presentations, storing information, but it's also good for long-term work like learning for an exam or tracking a project. At first, it'll remind you of Mind Maps but it's so much more!
item.content:encoded: OrgPad is a universal tool. It is good for planning, brainstorming, presentations, storing information, but it's also good for long-term work like learning for an exam or tracking a project. At first, it'll remind you of Mind Maps but it's so much more!

item.title: Image to Cartoon - Best AI cartoonizer online for free
item.description: ImagetoCartoon is an online AI cartoonizer that could convert your face to cartoon or anime style. Not only make cartoon avatars but also emoji yourself. Powered by the best AI technology, you can convert image to cartoon in seconds.
item.content:encoded: ImagetoCartoon is an online AI cartoonizer that could convert your face to cartoon or anime style. Not only make cartoon avatars but also emoji yourself. Powered by the best AI technology, you can convert image to cartoon in seconds.

item.title: Glitché NFT Tool - Create NFT art in a few taps
item.description: New version of Glitché is a perfect NFT-art tool with glitch-filters based on random data that cannot be recreated. Datamosh up to three videos from your camera roll or experiment with real-time recording.
item.content:encoded: New version of Glitché is a perfect NFT-art tool with glitch-filters based on random data that cannot be recreated. Datamosh up to three videos from your camera roll or experiment with real-time recording.

item.title: HomeMovie - Create memories together
item.description: HomeMovie brings back the nostalgia of the Camcorder with a twist. Create and record together with friends. As you capture the moment, you see all clips from everyone on the tape come in as they happen. It's a fun way to create memories together!
item.content:encoded: HomeMovie brings back the nostalgia of the Camcorder with a twist. Create and record together with friends. As you capture the moment, you see all clips from everyone on the tape come in as they happen. It's a fun way to create memories together!

item.title: Fugo TV Dashboards - Securely share business intelligence data on TV screens
item.description: Until now, there have been few ways to share critical data across whole organizations at scale. TV Dashboards let you replace unnecessary meetings, interruptions, emails & link sharing by putting your data up on your workplace TV screens for all to see.
item.content:encoded: Until now, there have been few ways to share critical data across whole organizations at scale. TV Dashboards let you replace unnecessary meetings, interruptions, emails & link sharing by putting your data up on your workplace TV screens for all to see.

item.title: Pokoy - Fibonacci timer for meditation
item.description: App for Meditation. It uses your cognitive biases of time estimates and encourages you to meditate more often.
item.content:encoded: App for Meditation. It uses your cognitive biases of time estimates and encourages you to meditate more often.

item.title: YouTube Transcripts 2.0 - SEO optimized YouTube transcripts, now with one click
item.description: You wouldn't expect to rank highly on Google without SEO. - Video transcriptions are crucial for the YT algorithm to know what your video is about. Auto-generated ones don't count. - Get fast, accurate and cheap transcriptions to get you the views you deserve.
item.content:encoded: You wouldn't expect to rank highly on Google without SEO. - Video transcriptions are crucial for the YT algorithm to know what your video is about. Auto-generated ones don't count. - Get fast, accurate and cheap transcriptions to get you the views you deserve.

item.title: Elecjet Apollo Ultra - Fastest charging power bank
item.description: Introducing Apollo Ultra, The World’s Fastest Charging Power Bank. Thanks to graphene enhancement, this 10,000mAh power bank charges itself at 100W in just under 27 minutes. You can even fast charge all of your devices with up to 85W of power.
item.content:encoded: Introducing Apollo Ultra, The World’s Fastest Charging Power Bank. Thanks to graphene enhancement, this 10,000mAh power bank charges itself at 100W in just under 27 minutes. You can even fast charge all of your devices with up to 85W of power.

item.title: BikeSpot - We help you explore our world and meet adventurers
item.description: BikeSpot.fr is a crowdsourced app for sharing and downloading GPS bike routes. Our mission: Allow riders discovering the unexplored and connect them together. Find your next ride on BikeSpot!
item.content:encoded: BikeSpot.fr is a crowdsourced app for sharing and downloading GPS bike routes. Our mission: Allow riders discovering the unexplored and connect them together. Find your next ride on BikeSpot!

item.title: D2C Hunt - Find hundreds of D2C brands you can collaborate with
item.description: D2C Hunt helps you find hundreds of brands Indian D2C brands ( Direct to consumer brands) you can collaborate with!! Saves you hundreds of hours of googling and scrolling through Instagram.
item.content:encoded: D2C Hunt helps you find hundreds of brands Indian D2C brands ( Direct to consumer brands) you can collaborate with!! Saves you hundreds of hours of googling and scrolling through Instagram.

item.title: Newsly 2.0 - Reads top trending news & articles in a natural human voice
item.description: Newsly picks up the most trending topics on the web and reads them in a natural voice. Now you can follow any topic you can think of, be it NFT, Metaverse, or The Kardashians! The entire web becomes listenable! Now also with podcasts, read mode and weather.
item.content:encoded: Newsly picks up the most trending topics on the web and reads them in a natural voice. Now you can follow any topic you can think of, be it NFT, Metaverse, or The Kardashians! The entire web becomes listenable! Now also with podcasts, read mode and weather.

item.title: Outlet Finance - Replace your bank account with DeFi
item.description: The Outlet Finance app allows your to replace your bank account with a simple and easy to use crypto wallet that is designed for the non crypto person.
item.content:encoded: The Outlet Finance app allows your to replace your bank account with a simple and easy to use crypto wallet that is designed for the non crypto person.

item.title: Fugue 3.0 - Fresh music to make your videos a blast
item.description: Finding the right music for a video can be challenging. And buying a proper license can be tricky. That's why the new Fugue comes with 5X more curated tracks and simple pricing. So you can get more music on a budget.
item.content:encoded: Finding the right music for a video can be challenging. And buying a proper license can be tricky. That's why the new Fugue comes with 5X more curated tracks and simple pricing. So you can get more music on a budget.

item.title: Presentation Camera - Live video on your Mac
item.description: Make your presentations or screen recordings more engaging by showing yourself on your desktop. Record a YouTube video, remove background from camera footage without requiring a green screen. Keep focus on your face just like iPad's centre stage, but on Mac.
item.content:encoded: Make your presentations or screen recordings more engaging by showing yourself on your desktop. Record a YouTube video, remove background from camera footage without requiring a green screen. Keep focus on your face just like iPad's centre stage, but on Mac.

item.title: WishTender - Creators- Get gifts from your fans!
item.description: The safest and most flexible universal wishlist for content creators. Easily list items and get funds from fans. With WishTender you can: ✅ Get cash for your gifts ✅ Send photo thank-you messages ✅ 34+ countries Sex Worker Friendly!
item.content:encoded: The safest and most flexible universal wishlist for content creators. Easily list items and get funds from fans. With WishTender you can: ✅ Get cash for your gifts ✅ Send photo thank-you messages ✅ 34+ countries Sex Worker Friendly!

item.title: AVDA: Find Jobs & Careers - An easy, resume-free way to find and apply for jobs
item.description: AVDA is a mobile app that simplifies job placements by translating resumes into easy to comprehend data that can be filtered and searched while giving the user a modern day dating like experience all while helping to decrease downtime and save company's money.
item.content:encoded: AVDA is a mobile app that simplifies job placements by translating resumes into easy to comprehend data that can be filtered and searched while giving the user a modern day dating like experience all while helping to decrease downtime and save company's money.

item.title: MindGarden - Fun, simple meditation that actually sticks
item.description: Get 1% happier every day through daily gratitudes, mood checks & meditation that you'll actually stick with. Grow/collect beautiful plants and at the end of each month cultivate a beautiful calendar (your MindGarden).
item.content:encoded: Get 1% happier every day through daily gratitudes, mood checks & meditation that you'll actually stick with. Grow/collect beautiful plants and at the end of each month cultivate a beautiful calendar (your MindGarden).

item.title: Glitch Image Generator - A generative tool to create glitchy images
item.description: A generative tool which allows you to create and save unique glitchy images. ⚡️
item.content:encoded: A generative tool which allows you to create and save unique glitchy images. ⚡️

item.title: Clips by Riverside.fm - You record once, we help you reach everyone
item.description: Clips is a way to transform your long-form content into multiple pieces of short-form content. Easily sharable on social media to reach more people with the same effort. You record once, we help you reach everyone!
item.content:encoded: Clips is a way to transform your long-form content into multiple pieces of short-form content. Easily sharable on social media to reach more people with the same effort. You record once, we help you reach everyone!

item.title: Xtra Clipboard - Boost your productivity with clipboards
item.description: Xtra Clipboard is a developer-friendly clipboard manager that is super fast and easy to use. Everything you copy in your device can be found in the clipboard history. It smartly sorts texts, websites, and code snippets separately.
item.content:encoded: Xtra Clipboard is a developer-friendly clipboard manager that is super fast and easy to use. Everything you copy in your device can be found in the clipboard history. It smartly sorts texts, websites, and code snippets separately.

item.title: Quest NFT Platform - Convert your social media posts into NFTs for free in 2 mins
item.description: We have built a super-easy way for Creators, Brands, and Communities to create NFTs straight from your social media channels for free and in under 2 minutes!
item.content:encoded: We have built a super-easy way for Creators, Brands, and Communities to create NFTs straight from your social media channels for free and in under 2 minutes!

item.title: Bouncebuster by Overloop - Real-time email verifier
item.description: Bouncebuster is a real-time email verifier that helps you fight bounce & increase email deliverability. Verify email addresses before sending and protect your domain reputation.
item.content:encoded: Bouncebuster is a real-time email verifier that helps you fight bounce & increase email deliverability. Verify email addresses before sending and protect your domain reputation.

item.title: Hexometer 3.0 - The most comprehensive website monitoring app
item.description: Get 24/7 peace of mind and catch website issues before they impact your business.
item.content:encoded: Get 24/7 peace of mind and catch website issues before they impact your business.

item.title: Slidekick - AI-powered slide deck builder, powered by GPT-3
item.description: Slidekick is your personal AI presentation assistant. It asks you a few questions about the slide deck you want to make and then creates it for you. This is a beta version. It has 1 use case: creating a startup pitch deck. More use cases will be added soon.
item.content:encoded: Slidekick is your personal AI presentation assistant. It asks you a few questions about the slide deck you want to make and then creates it for you. This is a beta version. It has 1 use case: creating a startup pitch deck. More use cases will be added soon.

item.title: Monq AIOps platform - World’s first topology-based AI-Ops automation platform
item.description: Monq is the world’s only self-hosted freemium platform for automated data collection and analysis. It turns your observability into proactive monitoring, helping IT teams prevent possible outages while minimizing costs and efforts.
item.content:encoded: Monq is the world’s only self-hosted freemium platform for automated data collection and analysis. It turns your observability into proactive monitoring, helping IT teams prevent possible outages while minimizing costs and efforts.

item.title: Search Party by Something Good - A fun, fast way to pick a Christmas movie together
item.description: Search Party by Something Good makes finding a Christmas movie together fun and fast.
item.content:encoded: Search Party by Something Good makes finding a Christmas movie together fun and fast.
